content: {"id": 710, "name": "ACT Care Foundation, Inc.", "address": "1698 Victory Blvd Staten Island NY, 10314", "city": "Staten Island", "state": "NY", "zip_code": 10314, "latitude": 40.613213, "longitude": -74.120247, "phone": 7184427467, "website": "actcarefoundation.com", "organization_id": 710, "pantry_id": 1681, "service_type": null, "has_appointments": false, "week_days": [], "source": "plentiful", "source_id": "710", "amenities": ["Client choice", "Distributes food based on household size", "Speaks Spanish", "Speaks Chinese", "Speaks Russian", "Other", "SNAP benefits enrollment"], "conditions": ["1 Visit per Every Two Weeks", "Geographic Restrictions: Up Coming Pantry Dates: June (closed)-- July: 7/10/2025, 7/24/2025 -- August: 8/7/2025, 8/21/2025-- September: 9/4/2025, 9/18/2025 -- October: 10/2/2025, 10/16/2025 -- November: 11/6/2025, 11/20/2025 -- December: 12/4/2025, 12/18/2025                                                                     However, ACT\u2019s scheduled date may change or be canceled due to unforeseen circumstances, such as inclement weather, illness, or etc.  A schedule change will be posted, and a message will be sent from the ACT plentiful app messaging system.  ACT pantry is by RESERVATION ONLY. Due to limited inventory, if you do not have a reservation, you are not guaranteed to be served.  If this is your first time visiting the ACT pantry, please speak to the staff.   "], "service_hours": [], "description": "", "kosher": false, "details_fetched": true}
